title: India votes against, Pakistan for Sri Lanka at UNHRC
content: – Submitted by Walter Jayawardhana – NEW DELHI: In a bid to placate departing ally, DMK, the UPA government played out a farce at the UN Human Rights Council (UNHRC), whereby India moved seven amendments to a US-sponsored resolution against Sri Lanka, and all of which were duly rejected by the US. In the end,…
